SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! CONNECTION DETAILS LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Protocol" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PROTOCOL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_HOST_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM ! SUDO DETAILS LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sudo Password" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Option" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_USE_SUDO#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sudo Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SUDO_USER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM ! COMMON DETAILS LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Weblogic Home" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "OSB Home" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_HOME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
